title: Dawnbringer Riven Border Misplacement/Size (Bug Report)
body:
Well, as everyone knows, today Dawnbringer Riven was released and she has a special border that can be obtained by purchasing the specific Icon in the loot rewards. Sadly, the border is misplaced just like when Elementalist Lux was released. Lux's border was misplaced at first and it took a while to get fixed. I am posting here today to ask if Riven's Dawnbringer border can be placed properly to fit inside the loading screen character panel properly rather than going out of it? Thanks.

Also, I believe this is happening with Yasuo too.

https://puu.sh/wlbed/377990178b.png

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up! I hadn't been able to test these borders out quite yet myself, but I'll be sure to do my best in passing this along to the right people. I'd also suggest posting this over in Report a Bug, that way it'll get more visibility.
Ayyyo, thanks for replying! I'll poke my team about it and see what we can do! <3
Yoooooo!!!! Thanks for the backup KateyKhaos!
Ofc! I gotchu fam! We're working to reintegrate 'em! :D

Thanks for the reply Broporo, I tried posting this in the Report a Bug section but for some reason it didn't read my account level correctly and said my account was not level 6 yet, so I posted it here just in case. I will try to post it again. Thanks again!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I'm seeing you as level 16 now so it worked! Hop on over to Report a Bug and you should be able to post now ^_^!
